entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Blind River
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating late this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 16 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 08 January 2023
